tool_description: Simple threat modeling for REST API based on OpenAPI/Swagger specification
name: Thremapi
title: Thremapi

api_list.name: analyzeOpenApiSpec
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thremapi.p.rapidapi.com/openapi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thremapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://thremapi.p.rapidapi.com/openapi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thremapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
